subject: Re: Dear Friend.
body:
Dear Friend,

I am Phillips Cole, I am a staff in a pharmaceutical company in the UK.
Originally from Scotland UK and working in London UK.
 I have a contract opportunity from our pharmaceutical company that pays
its suppliers to deliver raw material for their production needs.

Can you be able handle such? or bring a capable hand to handle such a
contract and earn 10% of the profit share?

or you handle the contract directly and we share the net profit at 60 /40 %
ratio.



The purpose of this email is to explore the possibility of utilizing you or
your company as a replacement for our current supplier, who is demanding
exorbitant profits for the supply of raw materials.


Specifically, we are seeking a new supplier for "Lactozora Herbs", which
are integral to the production of human fertility treatment and sexually
transmitted treatment medicine.

Our buying entity, a major pharmaceutical company based in the UK, is keen
to find a reliable supplier for this essential raw material. The source of
these herbs is a reputable farmer located in the USA. The farmer currently
sells the "Lactozora Herbs" at a reasonable price of
$870 per sachet, while our purchasing company is prepared to buy them at
$1200 per sachet.

If you express interest in pursuing this business opportunity, I will
gladly provide you with the contact details of the farmer. The potential
volume of orders from the pharmaceutical company ranges from 150,000 to
200,000 sachets, signifying a substantial and lucrative partnership for you
or your company. Upon successful execution of the contract, we would expect
both parties to share in the legitimate profits, given that I am the one
presenting this opportunity to you.

It is important to note that the raw material in question has extensive use
beyond the production of fertility and sexually transmitted treatment
medicines. It serves as a valuable ingredient in other antiviral drugs,
such as Azidothymidine. Interestingly, the current supplier has been known
to acquire the product from the same source while masquerading as the
original farmer.

This discovery was made when the farmer's contact details were
inadvertently included on the Airway bill.

The purchasing company is willing to provide advance payment once the
contract has been signed, allowing you to supply the products after the
necessary tests and samples have been provided. Your role in this
partnership would involve assuming the responsibilities of the
farmer/supplier, all while ensuring that the purchasing pharmaceutical
company remains unaware of the direct link between the farmer and yourself.

This strategic maneuver will ensure the protection of our business
interests and guarantee a fair share of the profits, which the previous
supplier has unscrupulously monopolized.

No specialized skills or prior experience are required to handle this
contract supply. You can efficiently manage this transaction from the
comfort of your own home or country.

To proceed, a profit share Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) will be
signed, outlining the distribution of profits. As the insider partner who
brought this opportunity to you, I propose a favorable ratio of 60% for you
to manage the transaction and 40% for myself.

Should you accept this proposition, I will provide you with detailed
procedural advice, guiding you step by step through the process. After
reading your positive response, we can proceed with signing the profit
share agreement and delve into further details.

Thank you for considering this unique opportunity. I am confident that by
partnering together, we can forge a lucrative and mutually beneficial
business relationship.

 I eagerly await your response.

Warm regards,

Phillips Cole.

subject: Re: Dear Friend.
body:
Dear Phillips Cole,

Thank you for reaching out to me with this opportunity. I must say, it sounds quite interesting. I would like to learn more about the details of this contract and how I can potentially be involved. Could you please provide me with some additional information?

1. What exactly is the role that I or my company would play in handling this contract? How would we be responsible for delivering the raw materials?

2. Can you provide more information about the farmer who supplies the Lactozora Herbs? Are they a reliable source? Have they been supplying these herbs to other companies successfully?

3. You mentioned that there is potential for a significant volume of orders ranging from X to Y sachets. Can you give me an estimate of how often these orders would need to be fulfilled?

4. Regarding the profit sharing, what percentage are you proposing for me or my company? And how will the profits be distributed between us and your purchasing company?

I appreciate your time and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ella

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Dear Ella,
Thank you for expressing your interest in my supply contract proposal. I
would like to provide you with further details regarding this opportunity.

To clarify, this business involves the contract supply of raw materials
with the intention of earning legitimate profit. It is important to note
that as an employee of my current company, I am unable to act as a
contractor supplier to the same company.

This is an open business venture with no hidden agenda. Transparency is
key, and you will have full visibility into all aspects of the process as
we move forward.

The contract involves the supply of Lactozora Herbs raw materials to an end
user company. Currently, the existing supplier is obtaining the raw
materials from the original farmer in the USA, whom our company believes is
the genuine producer. The current supplier is providing the materials at a
rate of $1300 per kg, while the original producer in the USA is selling at
less than $1000 per kg.

In order to make your price offer more competitive and attractive to secure
the contract opportunity, we suggest offering a lower price of $1,200 per
kg to our company.

Once trust is established, the company will arrange payment of 50% or 100%
to you upon receipt of mandatory laboratory test samples to assess the
quality of your raw material product as a new supplier.

It is worth noting that the Lactozora Herbs are used in the production of
human fertility treatment and sexually transmitted treatment medicine. As
such, there is a high demand for these materials, making this business
venture potentially lucrative.

After careful consideration, I have chosen to seek out a trustworthy
individual to take on this supply contract. The selected individual will
have the opportunity to share in the profits generated from this business
venture. This is why I have approached you with this opportunity.

Your role as the new supplier will involve direct dealings with the farmer
and ensuring that the products are packaged or labeled under your company's
name.

To give you an idea of the profit potential, if you were to multiply your
$330 profit per sachet by 20,000 kgs, you would obtain the profit from the
first 20,000 sachets supplied to our company.

As an incentive for your involvement, we will share the profits on a ratio
of 60% for you and 40% for me, given that I have facilitated your access to
this privilegedD business opportunity.

It is important to act swiftly to secure this contract before other
suppliers emerge from alternative sources.

If you are interested in proceeding, I kindly request the following
personal details in order to draft a Trust/Profit Share Agreement:

1. Your full name
2. Your full contact/permanent address
3. Your profession/occupation within your company
4. Your company's name and address
5. A valid copy of your identification


Once I receive the above details, I will send you a draft copy of the
Profit Share Agreement for your review. This will allow you to decide
whether you wish to proceed or not. The agreement will protect my interest
in offering you the opportunity to supply the product to the pharmaceutical
company.

If you choose to move forward, I will provide you with a draft sample of
the Supply Application Letter. This letter will need to be addressed to our
company and officially apply for the supply of the Lactozora Herbs.

Rest assured, this business venture will always be mutually beneficial as
long as there is a foundation of trust between us.

Please note that once the profit share Memorandum of Understanding (MOU) is
signed, I will provide you with direct contact details for the purchasing
department of the pharmaceutical company, as well as the farmer's contact
information. I will also supply you with a sample copy of the supplier
application letter to avoid any mistakes on your part.

Thank you for considering this opportunity. I look forward to receiving
your personal details and establishing a prosperous partnership.

Regards,
Phillips Cole.

*N/B:*

*The summary answers to your questions;*
*a. I ask for 40% because I am the one bringing out this opportunity to you
and I am also going to play a confidential role by providing you with all
the details you shall need to secure the contract and deliver the contract
without making a mistake as a first time supplier.*

*b. You will take 60% because you are the one to handle the contract as the
front man, manage the process, deal with the end user and the farmer as the
contractor. Your role will be very crucial to the success as the main
person the companies will be dealing with.*

*If you are bringing in another person to handle the contract as a broker,
you will then be compensated with 10% of the net profit. *

*c. The Farmers contact will be released after we both sign the Trust and
Profit share MOU. This is normal to protect our mutual interest without
betrayal of trust.*
attached are the pictures of the raw material.

Clarification answers to business operation questions below:



Question

What is the name of the raw material?



Answer; The raw material is a herbal plant processed into herbal powder by
the farmer/producer and named it Lactozora which was introduced to our
company by an  Indian Supplier that claims to be the original farmer as I
have explained in my previous emails to you. I hereby once again attach the
sample pictures to you to see the name on the product picture.



* Question*

I trust this missive finds you in the zenith of well-being and prosperity.
I am writing to express my sincere appreciation for the intriguing business
proposal you recently extended to me. Your sagacious insights and
comprehensive approach have not gone unnoticed, and I find myself
enthralled by the prospects encapsulated within your proposition.



In my ardent desire to gain a more profound comprehension of the
intricacies entwined within this venture, I venture to kindly solicit
further elucidation. Your erudite elucidation on the following aspects
would undoubtedly illuminate my understanding and foster a more judicious
evaluation of the proposed collaboration:



1. A Detailed Exegesis of the Core Business Concept: I beseech your
indulgence in expounding upon the fundamental tenets of the business model,
including its overarching goals and the modus operandi envisaged.



*Answer:*  This is a simple legitimate sales business to supply herbal raw
materials to the end user pharmaceutical company that needs such raw
materials.



               I need a business minded competent person to handle this
contract to supply the raw materials at a profit margin to earn legitimate
profit from the contract and share the profit with me as the person that
introduced such a business opportunity.





              I am working with this end user company and I am not
permitted to become a supplier to my employers. The person I am introducing
this business to will have an advantage to succeed with the information I
shall be providing to avoid mistakes that could lead to failure.







              As explained in my 2nd email, the Indian supplier is sourcing
the raw material herbs from a farmer in the USA and claiming to be the
farmer in India.





              Since I discovered this revelation that he is not the
original farmer and he is just a supplier that sources from the original
source to earn massive profit,

              I decided to get a replacement for him to enable me to get a
share from that huge profit he is taking alone as a greedy supplier.





              I shall give the original farmer and the end user company
contact to any one that is able to sign the Trust and profit share
agreement with me to guarantee my interest and confidential participation
in such a contract.





              Details below are required from such a competent, transparent
and reliable person.

              1. Your address
              2. Phone number
              3. Any means of identification copy
              4. Your company name
              5. Direct phone and whatsapp number for easier communication



*Question*



2. Financial Dynamics and Investment Parameters: A nuanced delineation of
the financial facets, encompassing capitalization requirements, projected
returns, and the risk mitigation strategies in place, would be most
invaluable.



*Answer: *

                  The new contract will need to do the following to secure
the contract and take over from the old supplier.

a.     To send an application letter to the end user pharmaceutical company
in the UK with an offer to supply the raw material at a very competitive
price.







b.     The only capital required here is for the normal contract approval
pursuance expenses, such as company registration cost if you have not
registered your company before now to apply for the contract. Any existing
company name with a bank account can be used to apply for the contract and
execute such a contract.







c.     To procure samples from the original farmer, labelled such samples
in your name that will be delivered to the pharmaceutical company required
for laboratory mandatory test before the pharmaceutical company can sign a
procurement contract with your company and release payment to your company
to execute the contract supply delivery.







d.      We are expected to earn 6 million USD in one contract slot if
successfully executed.

              This is the simple breakdown to that expectation.







e.     The farmer sells the raw material be sachet at INCLUSIVE OF SHIPPING
AND

                LOGISTICS $950

 You are to sell or supply to the pharmaceutical company at $1200 multiply
by 25,000 sachets  is 30,000,000





You are to supply a minimum 25,000 sachets. 250 net profit multiplied by
25,000  sachets is 6,250,000 As a first time supply, they will not approve
above 30,000 kgs to a first time supplier. You can get a higher contract
supply slot after the first contract is delivered.





         The risk mitigation process has to do with the following caution
steps.

             Protection of information about this contract from person’s
not concerned or 3rd parties that has no business with our contract



       Making sure my discussions with you are confidential, the company
will not give you any contract if they know you have an insider working
with you.





                       Respecting the terms of Profit share agreement
signed between us, failure to respect such will block the way for future
contracts.





                       Making sure the raw materials are sourced only from
the original source that has been supplying the old contractor from India.





                       Making sure that you do not try to maximize profit
by adulterating the original product to increase quantity and enhance
profit.









*Question:*

3. Operational Framework and Timelines: A comprehensive overview of the
envisaged operational framework, coupled with projected timelines for key
milestones, would greatly enhance my ability to envisage the trajectory of
this collaborative endeavor.





*Answer:*

a.      Each contract takes 2 months to complete due to delivery methods
that have to do with air cargo freight

b.     The contract, application, contract signing, contract payment takes
a maximum of 30 days and the delivery of the goods is expected to take 30
days or less

c.      The contract time frame depends on how fast you are able to act on
instructions and directives by making provisions of requirements and
details as already explained above.

d.     Operational framework starts with signing the trust and profit share
agreement with me and doing the needful as already explained above.



*Question:*

4. Risk Mitigation Strategies: In cognizance of the volatile nature of
contemporary business landscapes, a discerning elucidation on the
strategies delineated for risk mitigation would provide solace and fortify
my confidence in the proposed venture.





*Answer: *

  The contract opportunity demands you to develop a positive mindset and
never to mistake this offer as a scam because this is a 100%
legitimate business to earn legitimate profit by dealing with the farmer to
source the raw materials and selling to the end user at a profit margin to
earn legitimate profit in business. The raw material is simply a herbal
plant that is not unlawful to buy from the producers and sell to the end
user pharmaceutical company. It is called contract supply because the
supplier receives payment from the end user company after they have
complied with contract payment demands to receive payment for the contract
and supply the product. This only makes the difference between the regular
buy and sell regular trading.

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Dear Phillips Cole,

Thank you for providing me with more information about the supply contract proposal. I appreciate your transparency and willingness to share details about the business venture.

I understand that the raw material in question is called Lactozora Herbs, which is a herbal plant processed into herbal powder by the farmer producer. It is used in the production of human fertility treatment and sexually treatment medicine, making it a high-demand product.

You mentioned that the current supplier is obtaining the raw materials from the original farmer in the USA, but they are selling it at a higher price compared to what the original producer is offering. To secure the contract, you suggest offering a lower price per kg to your company.

I also appreciate your explanation of my role as the new supplier. It seems that I would be responsible for direct dealings with the farmer and ensuring that the products are packaged or labeled under my company's name. This sounds like an important responsibility in managing this business venture.

In terms of financial dynamics and investment parameters, you mentioned that there are no significant capital requirements other than normal contract approval expenses. The projected returns seem promising, with potential earnings of millions of USD in one contract slot if executed successfully.

Regarding timelines, it appears that each contract takes months to complete due to delivery methods, but the contract signing and payment process should take a maximum of days. The delivery of goods is expected to take days or less.

Lastly, I appreciate your emphasis on trust and respect between us as we move forward with this venture. I understand that failure to respect our agreement could block future contracts.

Overall, I am intrigued by this opportunity and would like to learn more about how we can proceed. However, before sharing any personal details or making any commitments, I would like to review any agreements or contracts you have mentioned. Could you please provide me with a draft copy of both the Profit Share Agreement and Supplier Letter for my review?

Thank you again for your time and I look forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ella

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Greetings,
how are you able to read so fast and understand so fast?
Are you actually interested, please be honest with me.
Thanks
Phillips

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Hello Phillips,

Thank you for reaching out. I'm glad you find my reading and understanding abilities impressive.

Best wishes,
Ella

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
SINCE WE ARE NOT ABLE TO EXCHANGE CONTACT DETAILS YET, CHECK IF THIS TRUST
AND PROFIT SHARING  TERMS ARE  OKAY BY YOU .

IF OKAY, YOU NEED TO SEND YOUR DETAILS TO DRAFT A PROPER MOU BEFORE
SIGNING, AS YOU CAN SEE THE NAMES ARE JUST IN ABBREVIATION AND NO ADDRESS
AND OTHER REQUIRED DETAILS FOR A PROPER AGREEMENT.
GO THROUGH AND REVERT TO ME. THANKS..

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your interest in sharing information. Could you please provide me with more details about the trust and profit sharing terms? I would like to understand how it works before making any decisions.

Best wishes,
Ella

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
REFER TO THE ATTACHED COPY.
THE PROFIT SHARING TERMS ARE ALL IN THE ATTACHED COPY.
THANKS

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your willingness to share information. However, I'm unable to open any attachments at the moment. Could you please provide a brief summary of the profit sharing terms? I'm interested in learning more about it.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Ella

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Hi Ella,
Sorry, if you can not open a Microsoft attachment, it means you will not be
able to open other documents as we make progress.
Your refusal to send your details shows you are not open to transparency, i
have gone ahead to send the soft copy of the mou to you, your refusal to
open the Microsoft copy means you have a lot of suspicion in mind, and if
my assumptions are correct, I will request we stop here. I don't want
anyone to do business with me that has a negative mindset towards me or the
business.
The contract opportunity is 100% genuine and I can only do the business
with  someone that has a genuine mind.
The summary of the MOU is
I gave you the contact details of the farmer and the end user buyer and you
execute the contract to take 60%  and give me 40% PROFIT SHARE ON NET
PROFIT.
If you are scared to open the microsoft copy of the mou, I can not help
such a situation.
Moreover, you have also refused to send your details that will enable me
know you better and create trust and confidence in you, why?
Thanks.
Phillips.

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details )
body:
Hi Phillips,

Thank you for reaching out to me again. I apologize if my previous response gave the impression that I am not open to doing business with you. I assure you that I am genuinely interested in learning more about the contract and exploring potential opportunities.

Regarding the Microsoft document, I apologize for any confusion. It seems there may have been a technical issue on my end. Could you please resend the document or provide an alternative way for me to access it? I want to make sure I have all the necessary information before making any decisions.

As for sharing my personal details, I hope you understand that it's important for me to exercise caution when dealing with new business partners. However, I am willing to provide some basic information about myself if it helps establish trust and confidence between us.

Could you please provide more details about the farmer and the end user buyer? What kind of products are involved in this contract? And how would the profit share on net profit be calculated?

I appreciate your patience and look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Ella

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details ) (FIRST THING FIRST) MOU TEXT BELOW
body:
*CONTRACT SUPPLY PROFIT SHARE AGREEMENT/MOU*

Between
MR. PHIL

Address:………………………………..

Phone:…………………………………..

ID No…………………………………..

 (Hereinafter referred to as the “*Supplier Contact in Stiglo P.C*”)

An d



*Ella*

Address:………………………………..

Phone:…………………………………..

ID No…………………………………..
(Hereinafter referred to as the “Supplier”)



THIS *(“CONTRACT SUPPLY PROFIT SHARE AGREEMENT*”) hereinafter referred to as
“IRREVOCABLE CONTRACT SUPPLY PROFFIT SHARE AGREEMENT” is

Entered into on this day *14th February, 2024 *between *Mr. Phil  and Ela.*



*BACKGROUND*

The Partners wish to associate themselves as partners in business.

This Agreement sets out the terms and conditions that govern the Partners
within the Partnership.



IN CONSIDERATION OF and as a condition of the Partners entering into this
Agreement and other valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of
which consideration is acknowledged, the parties to this Agreement agree as
follows:



That *Mr. Phil  *introduces a legitimate procurement contract supply
opportunity to *Ella**.*

That *Mr. Phil *Confidentially Intermediates between STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL
COMPANY and *Ella* on a genuine sales/contract supply transaction between the
purchasing entities STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY *and **Ella.*

That *Mr. Phil *agrees with *Ella* price of *Lactozora herbs use for
production of *Fertility drugs and Azidothymidine (AZT) Medicine
including (*$400
add up commission) *to *seller’s (farmers) *price per 1kg sachet.



That  *Ella* agrees with *Mr. Phil  *on the price to be issued on Proforma
Invoice going to the purchaser STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY



That *Ella* agrees to take 60% profit share and pay 40% profit share to *Mr.
Phil **prescribed account once STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY makes payment
to **Ella** or after **Mr. **Ella** has received payment from STIGLO
without delay.*

That The Purchaser being introduced by *Mr. Phil *to *Ella* is STIGLO
PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY



That *Mr. Phil  *guarantees *Ella* that STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY is
capable to pay *Ella** for the supply of Lactozora herbs.*

That *Ella* Guarantees *Mr. Phil  *to supply quality and standard *Lactozora
Herbal *products from the original farmer in USA to the purchaser STIGLO
PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY and *Mr. Phil *shall introduce the Farmers contact to
*Ella** after the signing of this trust and profit share agreement.*



That *Ella* is under obligation to pay 40% profit share as agreed
commission to *Mr. Phil *on any contract amount paid to *Ella* by the
Purchaser STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY as soon as the products are
delivered to the end user company.

That contract is valid only if the operation is concluded without
contravention by partners. The profit is shared according to % ratio above
after discount of all operation expenses.

The profit payment for *Mr. Phil *will be made only after receipt and
approval of the goods by STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY.
FORBIDDEN ACTS

No Partner may do any act in contravention of this Agreement.

No Partner may permit, intentionally or unintentionally, the assignment of
express, implied or apparent authority to a third party that is not a
Partner in the Partnership.

No Partner may do any act that would make it impossible to carry on the
ordinary business of the Partnership.

No Partner may individually consent to a judgment against the Partnership.

No Partner will have the right or authority to bind or obligate the
Partnership to any extent with regard to any matter outside the intended
purpose of the Partnership.

Any violation of the above Forbidden Acts will be deemed an Involuntary
Withdrawal of the offending Partner and may be treated accordingly by the
remaining Partners.
JURISDICTION

The Partners submit to the jurisdiction of the courts of *SCORTLAND AND
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES (UAE) *for the enforcement of this Agreement or any
arbitration award or decision arising from this Agreement.

This Agreement serves as Guarantee Bond between both parties in compliance
to the terms of this agreement Signed by both parties involved

Signatures


* MR. PHIL                                                 * (Supplier
Contact)





     *Ella** _________________________*

(Supplier)

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details ) (FIRST THING FIRST) MOU TEXT BELOW
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It seems like you have entered into a contract supply profit share agreement with Mr. Phil and Ella. Can you tell me more about the nature of this business partnership? What kind of products or services are being supplied? And how will the profits be shared between the parties involved?

I'm curious to learn more about the details of this agreement.

Best wishes,
Ella

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details ) (FIRST THING FIRST) MOU TEXT BELOW

steps.

not concerned or 3rd parties that has no business with our contract



       Making sure my discussions with you are confidential, the company
will not give you any contract if they know you have an insider working
with you.





                       Respecting the terms of Profit share agreement
signed between us, failure to respect such will block the way for future
contracts.





                       Making sure the raw materials are sourced only from
the original source that has been supplying the old contractor from India.





                       Making sure that you do not try to maximize profit
by adulterating the original product to increase quantity and enhance
profit.









*Question:*

3. Operational Framework and Timelines: A comprehensive overview of the
envisaged operational framework, coupled with projected timelines for key
milestones, would greatly enhance my ability to envisage the trajectory of
this collaborative endeavor.





*Answer:*

a.      Each contract takes 2 months to complete due to delivery methods
that have to do with air cargo freight

b.     The contract, application, contract signing, contract payment takes
a maximum of 30 days and the delivery of the goods is expected to take 30
days or less

c.      The contract time frame depends on how fast you are able to act on
instructions and directives by making provisions of requirements and
details as already explained above.

d.     Operational framework starts with signing the trust and profit share
agreement with me and doing the needful as already explained above.



*Question:*

4. Risk Mitigation Strategies: In cognizance of the volatile nature of
contemporary business landscapes, a discerning elucidation on the
strategies delineated for risk mitigation would provide solace and fortify
my confidence in the proposed venture.





*Answer: *

  The contract opportunity demands you to develop a positive mindset and
never to mistake this offer as a scam because this is a 100%
legitimate business to earn legitimate profit by dealing with the farmer to
source the raw materials and selling to the end user at a profit margin to
earn legitimate profit in business. The raw material is simply a herbal
plant that is not unlawful to buy from the producers and sell to the end
user pharmaceutical company. It is called contract supply because the
supplier receives payment from the end user company after they have
complied with contract payment demands to receive payment for the contract
and supply the product. This only makes the difference between the regular
buy and sell regular trading.

subject: Re: Dear Friend. (if interested, send required details ) (FIRST THING FIRST) MOU TEXT BELOW
body:
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm interested in learning more about the contract you mentioned. Could you please provide me with some additional details? What kind of contract is it and what are the terms involved?

I apologize if I seemed confused earlier. It's important for me to fully understand the contract before proceeding. Can you explain it to me again, step by step? I want to make sure I have a clear understanding.

As for competence, I believe it's crucial to have the right skills and knowledge to handle any contract effectively. Can you tell me more about your experience and expertise in this field?

Regarding the company, do you have a team or organization that will be involved in managing this contract? It's important to know who will be responsible for its execution.

Trust is indeed important in any business relationship. While I appreciate your willingness to get to know me better, could you please explain how sharing personal details would help establish trust in this particular situation?

If there are specific address and contact details required for signing an MOU, I can understand that. However, before providing such information, I would like to ensure that all necessary due diligence has been done on both sides.

To prove my capacity and competence, what kind of documentation or evidence would you require from me? Please let me know so that I can provide the necessary information.

I apologize if it seems like I am repeating questions. It's just that clarity is essential when discussing important matters like contracts.

I assure you that I am serious about exploring this opportunity further. If there are any concerns or doubts on your end, please let me know so we can address them together.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

Best wishes,
Ella

It seems like a straightforward sales business, where we supply herbal raw materials to end-user companies. I understand that the goal is to secure a contract and earn a legitimate profit from it.

body:

*Answer:  The details of the agreement between it has been sent, it is just
a statement of trust to do the business and share the profit. If any party
defaults, the offended party can seek legal process to correct the wrong. *
*terms of the Agreement between me and you are presented once again below
and it is self explanatory.*

*CONTRACT SUPPLY PROFIT SHARE AGREEMENT/MOU*

Between
MR. PHIL

Address:………………………………..

Phone:…………………………………..

ID No…………………………………..

 (Hereinafter referred to as the “*Supplier Contact in Stiglo P.C*”)

An d



*Ella*

Address:………………………………..

Phone:…………………………………..

ID No…………………………………..
(Hereinafter referred to as the “Supplier”)



THIS *(“CONTRACT SUPPLY PROFIT SHARE AGREEMENT*”) hereinafter referred to as
“IRREVOCABLE CONTRACT SUPPLY PROFIT SHARE AGREEMENT” is

Entered into on this day *14th February, 2024 *between *Mr. Phil  and Ela.*



*BACKGROUND*

The Partners wish to associate themselves as partners in business.

This Agreement sets out the terms and conditions that govern the Partners
within the Partnership.



IN CONSIDERATION OF and as a condition of the Partners entering into this
Agreement and other valuable consideration, the receipt and sufficiency of
which consideration is acknowledged, the parties to this Agreement agree as
follows:



That *Mr. Phil  *introduces a legitimate procurement contract supply
opportunity to *Ella**.*

That *Mr. Phil *Confidentially Intermediates between STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL
COMPANY and *Ella* on a genuine sales/contract supply transaction between the
purchasing entities STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY *and **Ella.*

That *Mr. Phil *agrees with *Ella* price of *Lactozora herbs use for
production of *Fertility drugs and Azidothymidine (AZT) Medicine
including (*$400
add up commission) *to *seller’s (farmers) *price per 1kg sachet.



That  *Ella* agrees with *Mr. Phil  *on the price to be issued on Proforma
Invoice going to the purchaser STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY



That *Ella* agrees to take 60% profit share and pay 40% profit share to *Mr.
Phil **prescribed account once STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY makes payment
to **Ella** or after **Mr. **Ella** has received payment from STIGLO
without delay.*

That The Purchaser being introduced by *Mr. Phil *to *Ella* is STIGLO
PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY



That *Mr. Phil  *guarantees *Ella* that STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY is
capable to pay *Ella** for the supply of Lactozora herbs.*

That *Ella* Guarantees *Mr. Phil  *to supply quality and standard *Lactozora
Herbal *products from the original farmer in USA to the purchaser STIGLO
PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY and *Mr. Phil *shall introduce the Farmers contact to
*Ella** after the signing of this trust and profit share agreement.*



That *Ella* is under obligation to pay 40% profit share as agreed
commission to *Mr. Phil *on any contract amount paid to *Ella* by the
Purchaser STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY as soon as the products are
delivered to the end user company.

That contract is valid only if the operation is concluded without
contravention by partners. The profit is shared according to % ratio above
after discount of all operation expenses.

The profit payment for *Mr. Phil *will be made only after receipt and
approval of the goods by STIGLO PHARMACEUTICAL COMPANY.
FORBIDDEN ACTS

No Partner may do any act in contravention of this Agreement.

No Partner may permit, intentionally or unintentionally, the assignment of
express, implied or apparent authority to a third party that is not a
Partner in the Partnership.

No Partner may do any act that would make it impossible to carry on the
ordinary business of the Partnership.

No Partner may individually consent to a judgment against the Partnership.

No Partner will have the right or authority to bind or obligate the
Partnership to any extent with regard to any matter outside the intended
purpose of the Partnership.

Any violation of the above Forbidden Acts will be deemed an Involuntary
Withdrawal of the offending Partner and may be treated accordingly by the
remaining Partners.
JURISDICTION

The Partners submit to the jurisdiction of the courts of *SCORTLAND AND
UNITED ARAB EMIRATES (UAE) *for the enforcement of this Agreement or any
arbitration award or decision arising from this Agreement.

This Agreement serves as Guarantee Bond between both parties in compliance
to the terms of this agreement Signed by both parties involved

Signatures


* MR. PHIL                                                 * (Supplier
Contact)





     *Ella** _________________________*

(Supplier)



> Secondly, I appreciate you sharing the sample pictures of the processed
> powder. Could you please provide some more information about these raw

>
*ANSWER: **The raw material is a herbal plant processed into herbal powder
by the farmer/producer and named it Lactozora which was introduced to our
company by an  Indian Supplier that claims to be the original farmer as I
have explained in my previous emails to you. I hereby once again attach the
sample pictures to you to see the name on the product picture.*
*These herbs are used to produce azidothymidine, letrozole, *
*gonadotropins and these medicines  market demand is very high.*


>
> Regarding the contract supply of raw materials, could you explain how the
> sourcing process from farmers works? Are there any specific criteria or
> certifications that need to be met in order to ensure quality?
>
*Answer:*
*The old India supplier simply buys from the farmer and instructs the
farmer to label and package the product in his name, the same method is
what you will apply.  I have answered this before now. *

>
> Lastly, I prefer not to share my phone number at this point. Can we
> continue our conversation through email for now?
>
*Answer: how can we do multi million dollar business and we hide phone
numbers from each other, it means you are not transparent and that is a red
flag? What are you hiding? we are not into criminal business and there is
no genuine reason to hide your phone number, *

>
> Thank you for your understanding.
>
> Best wishes,
> Ella

The company pays its suppliers or contractors to supply them the
raw materials after they have signed the procurement contract with such
contractors.
The only cost before this or the expenses required from the supplier is the
cost of providing samples for the end user required mandatory test to
convince the end user that your raw materials are of good quality.
once contract circle can be completed within 40 to 60 days.
Applying for to contract 2 to 3 days
company approval   3 to 5 days
provision of samples 7 to 10 days
testing of samples by the company 24 hours
Contract signing with the company 2 days
release of payment to suppliers account 5 days
Bulk order delivery to end user 21 days.
lastly, the only risk here is bypassing the original farmer or producer to
go and source from an unknown source, or trying to adulterate the original
product from the original farmer to enhance profit.  this will fail in the
laboratory test during production by the end user company.

*At this stage, I will not explain further, until you allow me to know you
and if this is not okay by you, good bye*
